CustomField.inlineHelpText: New clients only: the initial fee should be confirmed on the 'What will it cost initially?' slide, which will also specify from which wrapper(s) it will be taken from.Ensure this matches the 'Initial/ongoing charges' section of the narrative. New & existing clients:if there are transfer fees applicable, these should also be confirmed on the "What will it cost initially?' slide, specifying which products the transfer fees will apply to.Ensure no transfer fees apply to cash based products or small products
CustomField.label: Confirmed In Deck (Initial Fee)
